title: Freshly Renovated Studio in Trendy Nowy Sacz Suburb
description: Step into a bright, newly renovated studio apartment nestled in a peaceful and dynamic part of Nowy Sacz. This inviting ground-floor flat offers a well-planned open space with dedicated zones for living, working, and sleeping—perfect for easy, contemporary living. The thoughtfully designed interior is wheelchair accessible, and as a bonus, residents enjoy access to a modern shared sauna for ultimate relaxation. This is the perfect cozy yet inspiring space where you truly feel at home.

With several new cafes, small parks, and creative workspaces springing up, Suburb welcomes an active, social, and forward-minded community.
